title: Tracking your crypto portfolio in Airtable
description:
If you have made some investments in cryptocurrency, this workflow will allow you to create an [Airtable base](https://airtable.com/shrVzSe6GMNYsZ2Zx) that will update the value of your portfolio every hour. You can then track how well your investments are doing.

![image.png](fileId:383)

You can check out my [Airtable base](https://airtable.com/shrVzSe6GMNYsZ2Zx) to see how it works or even copy my base so that you can customize this workflow for yourself.

To implement this workflow, you will need to update the Airtable nodes with your own credentials and make sure that they are pointing to your Airtable
disclaimer: This workflow is provided as-is. Please review and test before using in production.
